messages.title: GOVERNMENT SHOULD CARE!
messages.content: Profits for the wealthy have been put ahead of caring for the electorate by government for too long. They force ordinary people to suffer Austerity Cuts and squeeze small local businesses, while allowing Corporations and the Super Rich to avoid paying up to £120 BILLION in tax.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping super rich and corporation tax dodging.
Scrapping tuition fees for our young people's future.
Making it reliable and low cost.
Essential free NHS care for all, and free social care for the elderly.
Support and investment in small local businesses and farmers.
Saving our green belt. Using brown field sites for new housing.

issues.environment: Saving our green belt. Using brown field sites for new housing.
issues.governance: Profits for the wealthy have been put ahead of caring for the electorate by government for too long.
issues.health: Essential free NHS care for all, and free social care for the elderly.

images.caption: Election Communication for Green Party - Saffron Walden Constituency.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Figure given by the PCS (the HMRC tax workers union).
